wf_workflow_version.condition: request_typeINPersonal loans requests,Debt consolidation requests,Business development requests,Low value loans requests,New store requests^f_n_d_state=1^request_stage!=Pre FP^loan_type_1_loan_terms_amount>javascript:getCurrencyFilter('x_spog_f_and_d_f_and_d','loan_type_1_loan_terms_amount', 'GBP;0.01')^EQ
wf_workflow_version.name: F and D - Loan WF
